2804.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_IN_NEX_SERVICE
2804.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2804.short_description: Your PNID is permanently banned from this game
2804.long_description: The account you are trying to use has been permanently banned from this game.
2804.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned
2804.long_solution: Appeal the ban on the forum.
